participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and creative, Emily loves learning new things and expressing herself through dance.
participant_1.background: i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and observant, Michael enjoys exploring the intricacies of human behavior and sharing his insights.
participant_2.background: i'm also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.

content.text: that s awesome   i studied chemistry   yet work in a bookstore
